title: Where are Y'all?
itunes:author: ESPN, Bomani Jones
itunes:subtitle: The Right Time: Big sports weekend, Gruden's gaffe and pro vs. joe voicemails!
content:encoded:
Bomani Jones dives into a big weekend across sports, such as Oklahoma's win over Texas or the Bills topping the Chiefs (1:23). Plus, he breaks down the situation regarding Raiders coach John Gruden (10:28), and gets to an IYHH that includes Facebook's big outage (34:34) as well as your voicemails from when you came across a future pro and lost miserably (43:15).


IYHH Stories

  1. @cathythorbecke breaks down Facebook’s outage from last week that took over 5 hours to fix: https://abcn.ws/3Duu8dT
  2. @bxchen shares that ‘stalkerware” apps are proliferating. Protect yourself: https://nyti.ms/3iStrDw
  3. @jonswaine shares how an IG star’s $7 million mission to rescue Afghani civilians didn’t work: https://wapo.st/3lwqAC0
